scripts.docker: docker-compose up -d cache messaging scylladb db traccar
scripts.docker:refresh: dotnet r docker:down;dotnet r docker;dotnet r build
scripts.install: dotnet restore && dotnet build && pnpm install
scripts.clean: dotnet clean && pnpm clean && rm -rf ./**/{bin,obj,node_modules} && pnpm store prune
scripts.k:compose: cd src/AppHost; dotnet aspirate generate --skip-build --output-format compose
scripts.opt:migrate: dotnet ef migrations add --project src/Infrastructure/Trace.Infrastructure.csproj --startup-project src/Infrastructure/Trace.Infrastructure.csproj --context Trace.Infrastructure.EFCore.Context.ServiceContext --configuration Debug Initial --output-dir EFCore/Migrations
